Root Scope:The Red Hat Root’s scope includes the open source community. Any open source organizations that prefer Red Hat as their Root; organizations are free to choose another Root if it suits them better.CNA-LR Scope:Vulnerabilities in software developed by a CNA within the Red Hat Root hierarchy.CNA Scope:Vulnerabilities in open source projects affecting Red Hat software that are not covered by a more specific CNA.
